briefTitle: Sodium Hyaluronate Ophthalmic Solution, 0.18% for Treatment of Dry Eye Syndrome
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Multicenter, Randomized, Controlled, Double-Masked Study of Safety and Efficacy of Sodium Hyaluronate Ophthalmic Solution, 0.18% in Dry Eye Syndrome
summary: The purpose of this study was to determine if Sodium Hyaluronate, 0.18% is effective in treating the signs and symptoms of dry eye disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Lissamine Green Staining (LGS) Total Score at Day 7
